title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Rundle, Alberta
content:
Photo submitted by James Smith, “Vermilion Lake in the foreground Mount Rundle behind. Banff, Alberta, obscured by the mountain on the right. Sunny and warm, some wet sections from melted snow but after several months of cold weather, who cares?” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Rundle, Alberta appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
